description: These soft-centered, marbled bars have all the hallmarks of a winning autumnal treat — spiced pumpkin, rich dark chocolate, toasty pecans and a splash of bourbon It's worth the extra effort to brown the butter; its warm toffee notes bring out the best of everything.
title: Gooey Pumpkin Chocolate Swirl Bars
title_page: Gooey Pumpkin Chocolate Swirl Bars Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: These soft-centered, marbled bars have all the hallmarks of a winning autumnal treat — spiced pumpkin, rich dark chocolate, toasty pecans and a splash of bourbon. It's worth the extra effort to brown the butter; its warm toffee notes bring out the best of everything.
